question: Rearrange the sentences to form a logical email:
items: Hi, Befan - How are you doing?
I have just started school again.
I'm trying to get used to waking up early.
I have great plans for the weekend.
I'll go camping in the desert with my cousins.
Don't forget, it's your turn next summer to come to S.A.
hint: Start with the greeting and end with the closing signature.
